welcome_message_body: Welcome to Spring, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic downtown, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Spring has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The newest terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A small terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, primarily serving United Express flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta, American, and JetBlue Airlines.
